QuestData.Title: Through the Troll Hole
QuestData.Description: It looks like Zanzil's portal into Zul'Gurub is still open. Zul'Gurub is a dangerous place, but Chabal entrusted this task to you.$b$bThe portal lies in wait in front of you.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use Zanzil's Portal and enter Zul'Gurub.$b$bIf you become lost or need to return to Zul'Gurub, speak with Chabal at Hardwrench Hideaway.
QuestData.RewardText: You have arrived safely within Zul'Gurub, the ruined capital of the once-mighty Gurubashi Empire.
